name: Moldrath's determination
description:
Card #23

Base points: 8 pts 

Ability reanimated corpse: Whenever a battle takes place in which both players tie, you may use this ability to untie the match in your favor. If the other player holds a Moldrath’s determination too, the one with more copies wins the battle.


No living were to be found for years during The Yellow Battles. No winners till Knight Moldrath reanimated dead body emerged from the red soil, with a thirst of victory and an urge to kill.
